synopsis.text: King Janus, the formidable Demon King, once led his demon race to victory over humans, elves, and gods in the relentless Neverland War. But the tables have turned as humans have seized Tenmaken, the legendary demon-slaying sword. In this newfound chaos, the fate of Neverland hangs in the balance. Princess Hiro, a half-human, half-demon, must confront her own prejudices against humans as she strives to protect her homeland from the impending conflict. With the potential to subjugate Neverland looming, will Hiro's efforts be enough to prevent another catastrophic war from engulfing the world? Join Hiro and her human allies in a thrilling adventure that will determine the future of Neverland!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
